item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact lmg_bit@163.com â€‹ I love hearing from people, so please email me at lmg_bit@163.com and introduce yourself. â€‹ Why? For two reasons: â€‹ I love getting to know people around the world. (Many of my best friends and even great loves are people who I met when they emailed to introduce themselves.) â€‹ Because I know a lot of people, I can help connect you with someone you should meet.

item.title: Now
item.description: What Iâ€™m doing now Focusing Well, thatâ€™s the meta-answer. There are times in my life when my head is up, looking around. And times when my head is down. Right now Iâ€™m completely head-down and focused. Not even reading. Just programming and writing every hour Iâ€™m awake. All work. No play. Except when Iâ€™m with my son.

item.title: How to change or build your career
item.description: I get emails from many people wanting to change or build their career. I always recommend the best book on the subject: â€œSo Good They Canâ€™t Ignore Youâ€ by Cal Newport. Here are a few of its best points: Forget passion and purpose â€‹ Forget â€œfollow your passionâ€ or â€œfind your true callingâ€. Stop thinking like that. Hereâ€™s why: â€‹ Words like â€œpassionâ€ and â€œpurposeâ€ are dangerous because they sound huge and romantic.
